issue.title: Atlas drifting while seated in car

content.raw:
Just for reference, running from deb installs of gazebo 1.8.5 and drcsim 2.6.4:

~~~
roslaunch atlas_utils vrc_task_2.launch
rostopic pub --once /drc_world/robot_enter_car geometry_msgs/Pose '{position: { x: -0.02, z: -0.12 }}'
rostopic pub --once /atlas/mode std_msgs/String -- nominal
~~~

and plotting `/ground_truth_odom` for the robot to check drift:

![mud seat drift](#!/osrf/drcsim/issue-attachment/320/osrf/drcsim/1370465154.88/320/mud_seat_drift_gazebo_1.8.5.png)
